– Kaise baa? – Sab thik baa, tohar?
– Bhai, e naya phone dekhal baa? – Haan, bilkul damdaar lagat baa.
– Aaj ka kaam puraa bhail? – Naahi, thoda aur baaki baa.
– Chalo chai pi ke aayi. – Accha, milat bani five baje.
– Tohaar ghar ke raasta kahan se jaat baa? – Railway station ke bagal se.
– Tohar exam kab baa? – Aagle somwaar se shuru hoat baa.
– Mummy ghar mein baa? – Naahi, bazaar gayil baa.
– Humra thoda paisa udhaar mil sakat baa? – Haan, jarur.
– Tu kahaan rahal kal? – Kaam se bahar rahal.
– Hum kahaan baithein? – E kursi khaali baa, yahin baith jaa.

Main bola, ‘naahi yaar, wo kaam possible hi nahi baa’.
Aaj to mood full off baa, kuch karne ke mann nahi.
Tu kahan jaat baa? Mall me shopping karbe?
